sentences.en: Don't gabble out your story man tell it calmly and clearly.
sentences.cn: 不要上气不接下气的说话冷静的把情况讲清楚.

sentences.en: Don't gabble, Lucy, I can't understand when you run your words together.
sentences.cn: 不要说得那么急, 露西,你说话象连珠炮似的, 我听不懂.

sentences.en: Don't gabble, Mary. I cannot understand when you run your words together.
sentences.cn: 不要说得那么急, 玛丽, 你说话像连珠炮似的,我听不懂.
不要说得太快, 说清楚点.

sentences.en: He speaks at such a gabble!
He used a dry sharp tone of command that cut through the restaurant gabble.
sentences.cn: 他只是用冷峻、锋利的命令口吻,压住了餐厅里的一片嘈杂声.

sentences.en: I am not arguing for the goose gabble of parliamentarians.
sentences.cn: 我并不赞成议会无尽无休的辩论.

sentences.en: In the end, I could not bear her gabble any more.
sentences.cn: 最后, 我终于受不了她的罗嗦了.

sentences.en: It's fun to hear her gabble.
sentences.cn: 听听她那一套胡说八道也是好玩的.

sentences.en: Just calm down, stop gabbling, and tell me what has happened.
sentences.cn: 冷静一下，说话别太急，告诉我发生了什么事。

sentences.en: Take your time and don't gabble!
sentences.cn: 说话从容些,不要急急忙忙,不要含糊其辞!

sentences.en: The gabble of excited children could be heard coming from the classroom.
sentences.cn: 可以听到激动的孩子们从教室里传出的叽哩咕噜说话.

sentences.en: Well, it's fun to hear her gabble.
sentences.cn: 那么, 去听听她的那套胡扯也挺有趣呀.

sentences.en: Who is speaking at such a gabble?
sentences.cn: 谁在说话说得那么急,叫人听不清楚?
你胡说八道得使我发疯了.

words.tran_cn: 喋喋不休地说；七嘴八嘴地说

trans.tran_cn: 急促不清的话，急促而含混不清地说
急促而不清楚地说话, 七嘴八嘴地说, 喋喋不休地说
trans.tran_en: to say something so quickly that people cannot hear you clearly or understand you properly
